title: Stompin' Tom Connors collection 23 CDs FLAC
description:
The amount of Stompin' Tom material online is really lacking. I've been collecting his stuff for a few years and this is as much as I have been able to find. To me, Stompin' Tom was one of the most important figures in Canadian music. Being one of the only ones to actually sing about the country where he was from. I guarantee you'll learn more Canadian history through this mans work than any high school history class. So here's to you Stompin' Tom and may your legacy live on into the digital age.
 
1969 Bud the Spud
1969 On Tragedy Trail (Vinyl)
1970 Merry Christmas Everybody
1971 Live At The Horseshoe
1971 Love & Laughter
1971 My Stompin' Grounds
1971 Sings 60 More Old Time Favorites (Vinyl)
1972 Stompin' Tom and The Hockey Song
1973 To It And At It
1974 'Muk Tuk' Annie
1975 North Atlantic Squadron
1976 Unpopular Stompin' Tom
1977 At The Gumboot Clogeroo
1988 Fiddle & Song
1992 Believe In Your Country
1997 Confederation Bridge
1998 25 of the Best Stompin' Tom Souvenirs
2001 Sings Canadian History
2002 An Ode for the Road
2004 Hockey Mom Tribute
2008 The Ballad Of Stompin' Tom
2009 A Proud Canadian
2012 Stompin' Tom & the Roads Of Life



Stompin' Tom Connors - On Tragedy Trail (Dominion Records - LPS 21008)
Stompin' Tom Connors - Sings 60 More Old Time Favorites (Boot Records - STC 2)

Transfered using Philips GA 312 turntable (Philips 401 cartridge w/ 401 II stylus)

Onkyo A-809 Integra R1 stereo receiver tape out into Creative Audigy 2 ZS soundcard.

Tracks split with CD Wave
